channel.title: Changing exp recieved from doors dummys and hay bales
channel.description: can sum1 give me a code for all three of the training objects? plz

item.title: Changing exp recieved from doors dummys and hay bales
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you would search for the case of that object, (i.e. the dummy object id is 823, so you would search for ‘case 823’.)

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy."); setAnimation(422); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0); actionTimer = 35; } break;

set the ‘150’ to whatever you want for the xp given.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing exp recieved from doors dummys and hay bales
